function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Overpopulation in buildings leading to increased risk of contagious disease transmission","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease spread and outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implementing occupancy limits and promoting remote work options","Technologies":"Smart building systems for capacity management and remote work infrastructure","People":"Building occupants, residents, and visitors","Owner":"Building management and owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and natural light in buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission and poor mental well-being","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems and optimizing building layouts to increase natural light exposure","Technologies":"Ventilation monitoring systems and daylight simulation software","People":"Building occupants, especially those with respiratory conditions","Owner":"Building management and owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate hygiene and waste management in buildings","Impact":"Higher risk of water and vector-borne diseases, and poor environmental conditions","Mitigation":"Implementing proper waste disposal systems and ensuring hygienic water supply","Technologies":"Smart waste management systems and water purification technologies","People":"Building occupants, residents, and visitors","Owner":"Building management and owners"}]}
